mil3.1.12:1.3_1: vīriyūpatthambhitā sabbe kusalā dhammā na parihāyantī”ti.
mil3.1.12:2.2_1: puriso gehe patante aññena dārunā upatthambheyya,
mil3.1.12:2.2_2: upatthambhitaṁ santaṁ evaṁ taṁ gehaṁ na pateyya;
mil3.1.12:2.3_2: vīriyūpatthambhitā sabbe kusalā dhammā na parihāyantī”ti.
mil3.1.12:3.2_2: tato rājā aññamaññaṁ anussāreyya anupeseyya attano parittakāya senāya balaṁ anupadaṁ dadeyya,
mil3.1.12:3.2_3: tāya saddhiṁ parittakā senā mahatiṁ senaṁ bhañjeyya;
mil3.1.12:3.3_2: vīriyūpatthambhitā sabbe kusalā dhammā na parihāyanti.
mil3.1.12:3.5_0: ‘vīriyavā kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako akusalaṁ pajahati, kusalaṁ bhāveti.
